title: Failed to connect to game(after champ select, never even shows champion splash art).
body:
I'm sure that this problem is well known, these are my experiences.  First had this happen 2-3 days ago, and have experienced it a total of 4 times in the past few days.  Seems random, game before and game after connect perfectly fine.  I cannot comment as to if it started right after 6.16 or not, but still occurred post update to 6.17.  Have ran the hextech setting tool that was provided in another discussion of the problem, but have experienced error after running the tool.  Have restarted computer, restarted game, re-installed, still nothing.  I had found another thread discussing releasing my current IP lease and refreshing, though I cannot confirm if this fixes or not.

The problem is that these failure to connect errors (while I will admit is not the responsibility of riot, it is definatly something that I chose to have happen and have been taking action to fix), have caused me to be given queue penelties by LeaverBuster.  This is very frustrating as you can imagine.  Also hilariously over the top is sitting in a 10 minute inflated queue, and have someone be AFK, to get put out and then right back into a 10 minute inflated queue.  Feels bad man.

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be some inconsistencies in your connection to the server. This can happen if there are some issues along your route to the server or if there are some problematic local network settings. As a first step, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as it has a high success rate in resolving these types of issues. 

Let me know if you still see these problems after following the guide.
I think is server collapse by fix a lot of bugs problems.
